page.title: 09EVENTS, FARMING
page.content: are more for 'the fun of the fair' than personal achievement although this aspect too is present. The week is a full timetable for children! What makes the week, for many adults, is that the pubs are open all day!! Events are associated with the Church - Christmas celebrations about the tree in Fore St; or the Nation - weddings and jubilee celebrations etc. {FARMING}See first GENERAL REVIEW & ECOLOGY. It is impracticable to study the area using the sq km method. Farms are invariably fragmented and consequently the (map) farms are studied by name. When land is purchased by a growing farm, often the 'old' farm house is sold - Hole Farm is such a case. Also, Horridge Moor, drained, is part of a larger farm out- side the area studied. So too, is some of the NE grid square - part of the
